content.raw:
I'm testing this on quantal with ogre 1.7.4 and I get a seg-fault in UNIT_GpuLaser_TEST:
~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffd7fff700 (LWP 21387)]
0x00007ffff6f39d84 in gazebo::rendering::GpuLaser::~GpuLaser (this=0x6db980, __in_chrg=<optimized out>)

73	      this->secondPassTexture->getName());

content.html:
I'm testing this on quantal with ogre 1.7.4 and I get a seg-fault in UNIT_GpuLaser_TEST:

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffd7fff700 (LWP 21387)]
0x00007ffff6f39d84 in gazebo::rendering::GpuLaser::~GpuLaser (this=0x6db980, __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/GpuLaser.cc:73
73        this->secondPassTexture->getName());
(gdb) bt

content.raw: I haven't tested with ogre 1.8, but all the tests pass with ogre 1.7.4 on quantal.
content.html: I haven't tested with ogre 1.8, but all the tests pass with ogre 1.7.4 on quantal.

content.raw:
I've tested it on Saucy and test passes just fine.

Playing with test/worlds/gpu_laser_heightmap.world does not show any problem.
content.html:
I've tested it on Saucy and test passes just fine.

Playing with test/worlds/gpu_laser_heightmap.world does not show any problem.
